data.text:
@kyle_minogue @WinnipegSD @RETSDschools @SevenoaksSchool @LRSDschoolboard @SJASDivision @PembinaTrails You have a week to follow the teacher’s professional code of conduct and put the welfare of your students above the cowardice of this government

Show us that you are better than them

@kyle_minogue Do not let the government’s lowering of the floor of protections stop you from raising the roof!!!

@WinnipegSD @RETSDschools @SevenoaksSchool @LRSDschoolboard @SJASDivision @PembinaTrails
@RiverCate Seems to be the case with long covid. Unless patients advocate for themselves it is getting ignored.

@kyle_minogue I had to tear a strip off my doctor for 20 mins before he started listening. I said it was shameful he wasn’t taking me seriously. Next thing I knew, he was referring CT scans, neurologist, the pilot program, he’s taking it seriously now but I had to strongly advocate for myself.
@RiverCate I am sorry to hear that. I wish it was widely acknowledged and taken seriously in the province.

@kyle_minogue I’m in a long covid group pilot program with the WRHA, there are about 50 ppl participating. I’m one of the lucky ones, my symptoms haven’t been debilitating like so many. I find sometimes I have to turn off the camera bc I’m crying. Long covid is no joke, that’s for sure.
@kyle_minogue This is super concerning to me. And how do we recognized they have long COVID if no official record of a positive test.
